publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1461.2 Sarah Boyack: Transport-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1461) in the name of Bruce Crawford, leave out from "with concern" to end and insert "the progress being made by the Scottish Executive to build a sustainable, effective and integrated transport system which provides genuine choice and delivers a safe, accessible and expanding Scottish rail system as an integral part of the GB rail network."
